name: Loadit.scss
tagline: A SCSS mixin that turns a single element into a loading icon, built with just CSS
body:
*Currently version 0.9* A SCSS mixin that turns a single element into a loading icon, built with just CSS! How to use - Import the _loadit.scss file: ```css @import "loadit"; ``` No extra html elements needed, simply use a single element, and add the mixin in your SCSS: ```html
``` ```css .loadingDiv{ @include loadit-bars; } ``` It can also take arguments, with many different animations available: ```css .loadingDiv{ @include loadit-target($color:red,$size:20px,$animation:wave); } ``` [Demos](http://jacob-gray.github.io/loadit.scss/demos) - [Documentation](http://jacob-gray.github.io/loadit.scss/docs) -
